text: 6:51 Jon 3:13; Hibru 10:5; 10:10Kɨ uabɨ dagher kam, ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim anɨdim, Godɨn Nguibam ategha izaghirɨ. Eghtɨ gumazitam dagher kam ameghɨva, a zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim iniam. Dagher kɨ a danɨngamim, a nan inivafɨzim. Kɨ kamaghsua, nguazimɨn gumazamiziba me angamɨra ikiam, kamaghɨn kɨ me bagh uan inivafɨzim anenigham.”
